adaptableLearningRates

Class ELK1

  • java.lang.Object
    • adaptableLearningRates.LearningRates
      • adaptableLearningRates.ELK1
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable

    public class ELK1
extends LearningRates
    Implementation of Suttons linear K1-algorithm and Schraudolphs non-linear extension ELK1.
    Author:
    Markus Thill
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

    • Constructor Detail

      • ELK1

        public ELK1(TDParams tdPar,
    int length)
        Create all individual learning-rates according to the K1 or ELK1 algorithm.
        Parameters:
        tdPar - User-defined parameters.
        length - Length of the corresponding weights-vector. For each weight one learning rate is created.

      • adjustBeta

        public void adjustBeta(int i,
              double delta,
              double deriv,
              double x_i)
        Parameters:
        i - Index of weight i.
        delta - Error-Signal.
        deriv - Derivation. 1 for K1 and (1-y^2) for tanh as activation function.
        x_i - Input (of the feature vector) for index i.

      • getAlpha

        public double getAlpha(int i)
        Determine the individual stepsize alpha_i. This is e^(beta_i)
        Parameters:
        i - Index of weight i.
        Returns:
        The individual step-size alpha_i.
